title: Bill the Pony (P) (0P2)
text:
Set:	Promotional
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony if he is at an underground site during the fellowship or regroup phase.
Rarity:	P
Notes:	Lists: ERL, MXL. When the fellowship moves with Bill the Pony to an underground site, the Shadow number of that site is reduced before Bill the Pony is discarded.
